info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 19 at 2:13AM CDT until September 19 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MACOUPIN AND NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 213 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Farmersville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Raymond and Litchfield. This also includes Lake Lou Yaeger. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 60 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
